title: McLaren's Monaco miracle: when Hamilton was blessed by F1 racing gods
summary: Lewis Hamilton's victory in the 2008 Monaco Grand Prix reinvigorated his charge to a first world title. But asMatt Bishoprecalls, luck had a lot to do with this turning point in the championship

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Lewis Hamilton win his first Monaco Grand Prix?
What significant outcome resulted from Hamilton's victory in the 2008 Monaco Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It reinvigorated his charge to a first world title.
wrong_options: It secured his second world title.
It led to a major rule change.

qa_pairs.question: Which team did Lewis Hamilton drive for during his 2008 Monaco Grand Prix victory?
